name: Auto Filter Bot
description: I'm an advanced auto filter bot with modified features.

INDEX_CHANNELS.1001806459453: ID of index channels. Separate multiple IDs by space.

ADMINS.5936007998: ID of Admins. Separate multiple admins by space.

PICS.description: Add some telegraph link of pictures.

LOG_CHANNEL.1001881972759: Bot Logs. Give a channel ID with -100xxxxxxx

AUTH_CHANNEL.1001504604701: ID of channel. Make sure bot is admin in this channel. Without subscribing this channel users cannot use bot.

AUTH_USERS.description: ID of users to give access of inline search. Separate multiple users by space.

DATABASE_URI.mongodb+srv://aryan123:aryan123@cluster0: MongoDB URI. Get this value from https://www.mongodb.com

DATABASE_NAME.description: Name of the database in MongoDB. Defaults to Cluster0

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collections. If you are using the same database, then use different collection name for each bot.
